resources.string: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to
Dear Customer, Your EMS Subscription Expired.\nUpdate your plan and use our services.
Choose your User type as a Company & Employer and click \"Join\" button.
Choose your User type as an Employee and click \"Join\" button.
Choose your User type as a Company & Employer and click \"Join\" button.

If you did not add any department ,you will get a pop-up to add a department when you logged in using your Founder/Manager/Super admin credentials.\n Mention Department Name and Description then click on \"Create Department\".
Enter your organization basic info based on given fields and Click on \"Create Organization\" button.
Choose your Plan type as a PAID VERSION or TRIAL VERSION.If you choose TRIAL VERSION, Try it free for 30 Days. \nIf you choose PAID VERSION, based on your plan subscription you will get our Services.
Enter \"Founder\" mobile number and click on Verify button.You will get OTP within few seconds. Enter OTP to verify it.
Enter \"Employee\" mobile number and click on Verify button.You will get OTP within few seconds. Enter OTP to verify it.
Enter Founder\'s Basic information and based on given fields and Click on \"Create Founder\" button.
Verify Organization code which shared on email or by Manager.\nEnter Employees\'s Basic information and based on given fields and Click on \"Create Employee\" button.

Click on \"Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)\" and Click on \"Department\".You will get department list and \"Add Department\" button.\nClick on \"Add Department\" button,you will get pop-up. Mention Department Name and Description then click on \"Create Department\".

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Attendance".You will get employees list with their attendance status(Present/Absent).
Click on Employee's Name,you will get two options there.
 • By clicking on "UPDATE" you can change attendance status of employee for example present to absent or vice versa.
 • By clicking "VIEW" you can see related employee dashboard . In this dashboard it will show current date details of employee

Click on "Attendance". 
•If you want to put check-in , click on Check-In Icon before that you need to on GPS in your mobile.After successful check-in. your check-in time will display below on icon.
•If you want to put check-in , click on Check-Out Icon before that you need to on GPS in your mobile.
•You can also able to put your attendance by scaning QR Code if it is placed on your Organization.

Click on "Attendance". 
•If you want to put Meeting check-in , click on Meeting Check-In Icon before that you need to on GPS in your mobile.You will get pop-up to fill basic meeting details.
After successful check-in. your check-in time will display below on icon.
•If you want to put Meeting check-in , click on Meeting Check-Out Icon before that you need to on GPS in your mobile.

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Task".You will get employees list with their attendance status(Present/Absent).
Click on Employee's Name,you will able to see task list of that particular employee for today.
 • By clicking on "Date" you can change date and see the task list on selected date with status .
 • By clicking "Pencil" you can create task for that employee. you can assign task with Geo fencing(optional)

Click on "Task".You will get task list of all employees for current date.
Click on Employee's Icon,You will get employees list with their attendance status(Present/Absent).
Click on Employee's Name,you will able to see task list of that particular employee for today.
 • By clicking on "Date" you can change date and see the task list on selected date with status .
 • By clicking "Pencil" you can create task for that employee. you can assign task with Geo fencing(optional)

Click on \"Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)\" and Click on \"Task\".you will able to see task list of yours for today.\n • By clicking on \"Date\" you can change date and see the task list on selected date with status .\n • By clicking \"Pencil\" you can create task for you. you can assign task with Geo fencing(optional)

Click on \"Task\".you will able to see task list of yours for today.\n • By clicking on \"Date\" you can change date and see the task list on selected date with status .\n • By clicking \"Pencil\" you can create task for you. you can assign task with Geo fencing(optional)

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Expenses".You will get expenses list of all employees for current date.
Click on Employee's Icon,You will get employees list with their attendance status(Present/Absent).
Click on Employee's Name,you will able to see expense dashboard of that particular employee for current month.
 • By clicking on "Date" you can change month and see the expense dashboard on selected month.

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Expenses".You will get two tab Create Expense and Expense List.
Click on Expense List,you will able to see expense dashboard of yours for current month.
 • By clicking on "Date" you can change month and see the expense dashboard on selected month.

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Leaves".You will get two tab Apply Leave and Leaves.
Click on Leaves,you will able to see leave dashboard of yours for current month.
 • By clicking on "Date" you can change month and see the leave dashboard on selected month.

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Leaves".You will get employees list with their attendance status(Present/Absent).
Click on Employee's Name,you will able to see leaves dashboard of that particular employee for current month.
 • By clicking on "Date" you can change month and see the leaves dashboard on selected month.

Click on "Notifications" and Click on "Expenses".You will get expenses list of all employees for current date.
Click on Employee's Icon,You will get employees list with their attendance status(Present/Absent).
Click on Employee's Name,you will able to see expense dashboard of that particular employee for current month.
 • By clicking on "Date" you can change month and see the expense dashboard on selected month.
Click on \"Notifications\" and Click on \"Expenses\".You will get expenses list of yours for current date.• By clicking on \"Date\" you can change date and see the expense list on selected date.\n

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Live Tracking".You will get employee's updated last location.
•Click on Employee's Icon(top on Title bar),you will get employees list.
 • By clicking on employee name you can check employees location based on data also •
 By clicking "Calendar Icon" you can change date and check location of employees

Click on "Hamburger Icon(three horizontal lines which is in top right)" and Click on "Employees".You will get employees list and "Floating" button(bottom right corner).
Click on "Floating" button,you will redirect to "Create Employee" screen. Mention Employees info based on given fields then click on "Create Employee".
 •Admin : If Related Employee is Manager or Super Admin Or Team Leader or You want to make him/her as a Admin for other Employees then Admin Button Should be “Yes”. 
 • Check in Location: If your employee has to check in from only office location the checked in this check box.
If your employee is sales employee and he/ she has to check in from any location then don’t checked in this check box. 
• Check in Time : If your Employee has to check in within office check-in hours Only then Checked in this check box.(Suppose Your Office timing is Morning 9 O’clock then Employee has to Check in Before 9 O’clock ).
